result.eng: In a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.

result.ponchtml: Cé nár ṫiteamar amaċ le ċéile ar fad ṫáinig fuaċt ar an gcairdeasAlthough we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.

result.eng: For some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ga: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.orig: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.html: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astuFor some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ponchtml: Ar ċúis éigin ḃí eagla orm roiṁ na madraí marḃa cé naċ raiḃ cor astuFor some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.

result.eng: Who are you to me? [Who are you, stranger, and why are you talking to me?]
result.ga: Cé tusa domsa
result.orig: Cé tusa domsa
result.html: Cé tusa domsaWho are you to me? [Who are you, stranger, and why are you talking to me?]
result.ponchtml: Cé tusa domsaWho are you to me? [Who are you, stranger, and why are you talking to me?]

result.eng: Although slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.
result.ga: Cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na Stát Aontaithe ba cheist lárnach í
result.orig: Cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na Stát Aontaithe ba cheist lárnach í
result.html: Cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na Stát Aontaithe ba cheist lárnach íAlthough slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.
result.ponchtml: Cé nárḃ é an scláḃaíoċt an t-aon ċúis le cogaḋ caṫarṫa na Stát Aontaiṫe ba ċeist lárnaċ íAlthough slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.

result.eng: Whose boy is that?
result.ga: Cé leis an gasúr
result.orig: Cé leis an gasúr
result.html: Cé leis an gasúrWhose boy is that?
result.ponchtml: Cé leis an gasúrWhose boy is that?

result.eng: Who did you pray for? Who are all the people you prayed for?
result.ga: Cé leis uilig ar chuir tú paidir
result.orig: Cé leis uilig ar chuir tú paidir
result.html: Cé leis uilig ar chuir tú paidirWho did you pray for? Who are all the people you prayed for?
result.ponchtml: Cé leis uilig ar ċuir tú paidirWho did you pray for? Who are all the people you prayed for?

result.eng: He was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ga: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.orig: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.html: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé eadar ḋá ċóṁairle cé acu a ḃéarfaḋ sé leis an príosúnaċ nó a ligfeaḋ sé a ċeann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
